m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- This New Finance Policy Tweak Boosts India Solar Energy By  Tara Parthasarathy and Alex Perera , World Resources Institute India is facing down one of the key challenges confronting developing economies: Can it reduce power-sector emissions to curb climate change without hindering economic growth? This challenge became even more pressing when China and the United States, the world’s two largest carbon emitters, agreed to landmark emissions reductions and renewable energy targets .
